|brand = Aerohive |model = AP370 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = AH-AP370-AC-W |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = WBV-AP3X0 |icid = 7774A-AP3X0 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);P1020; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = PowerPC |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 533â€“800 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9K8G08U0D-SCB0; |flash1size = 1 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB128M16HP-DI; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1322; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = E0:1C:41 |oui = E0:1C:41
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.11;jenkins-HiveOS-Honolulu_AP390_Rel-35; |stockos = Linux;2.6.32;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_poe_type = af/at |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (9600 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = LACP, PoE in, TPM, IPSec |addchip = USB 2.0 (Hi-Speed) PHY;SMSC;USB3300;;1;,,, Phototransistor Photocoupler;Everlight;EL357N;;4;,,, High-Side Current-Sense Amplifier;Silicon Labs;TS1100;;4;,,, 4 Output PCIe Gen 1/2 Synthesizer;Renesas;IDT5V41186;;1;,,, Trusted Platform Module LPC Interface;Atmel;AT97SC3204;;1;,,, 150V 5A N-Channel MOSFET;UNIKC Semiconductor;P6015AV;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3232C;;1;,,, 2.4 GHz Power Amplifier w/Power Detector;Skyworks;SE2598L;;3;,,, High Power TVS for Ethernet Interfaces;Semtech;RClamp3374N;;4;,,, 16V 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power;MP1493;;3;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-And Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC08A;;2;,,, 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;Texas Instruments;TPS23754;;1;,,, 4.2V-16V 2A Synchronous Step-down Converter;Monolithic Power;MP1492;;2;,,, 3A 1.05-3.6V DDR2/3/3L/4 Memory Termination Regulator;Monolithic Power;MP20075;;1;,,, High-Power 802.11ac WLAN Power Amplifier w/Power Detector;Skyworks;SE5003L1-R;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = aerohive |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/29/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01LFTVDO6 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9590;AR9590-AR1A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9890;QCA9890-BR4A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N:142000000745A REV:01" is silkscreened on the board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' ([[NXP]]) P1020 Dual-core ''PowerPC'' (@800MHz) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 1GB SLC NAND Flash *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *WiFi: 1x [[Atheros]] AR9590 (3T3R 802.11bgn) : 1x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9890 (3T3R 802.11abgn+ac) *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel or 802.3af
==Links of Interest== [https://docs.aerohive.com/330000/docs/help/english/6.4r1/hm/full/Content/hw/ap/AP370_AP390.htm Product Documentation]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:Aerohive AP370 Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:Aerohive AP370 Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
